Space Wrench.Description: A wrench best used in space.

Zombie Armor.Description: Looks to be in good shape, don't mind the blood.

Zombie Katana.Description: Funny, you like samurai swords... I like baseball.

Swiss Army Knife.Description: This has many uses but it can't fix my ship.

Health Kit.Description: Quick patch. Restores a bit of HP.

Lever.Description: The missing lever from the refueling station.
